text: Nan nzɨgi, mbe wari wo ndavi vheri kaŋgiap, mbe guigira Fhe Bakɨme nɨman ŋgarav, mbe tɨvar vhuuŋra zɨn vov, Fhe Bakɨmen ŋaara muuŋgi. Gu ntigem mba khesharigi tɨvara zɨn vov Fhe Bakɨmen ŋaara mbui. Gu vhɨra won ndav vhee kaŋgi. Gu bigɨn mbatɨk thueŋ muuŋgip ne nzuav ana nɨman simtɨk ki fhuvara. Gu raa gu maan ana phorga nzuav, gu ndu ndɨkndɨgap Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuav anan ndikndigi.
